headline: Stanley Black & Decker Appoints Bill Beck President, Tools & Outdoor
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE: SWK) today announced that Bill Beck has been appointed President, Tools & Outdoor, effective October 1. Beck will be responsible for optimizing Stanley Black & Decker's strong portfolio of brands and products while advancing the strategic roadmap for the Tools & Outdoor business. He currently serves as General Manager and Chief Growth Officer, Tools & Outdoor and is responsible for driving market leadership, strategic growth and brand positioning for the company's g
